headline: How the Story Around DraftKings Is Shifting Amid New Competition and Analyst Downgrades
summary: DraftKings stock has seen its consensus analyst price target revised downward, slipping from $50.74 to $46.05 based on recent research updates. This adjustment reflects a blend of optimism about revenue growth alongside caution regarding ongoing pressures and shifting market dynamics. Stay tuned to learn how investors can track these evolving outlooks and stay ahead in the fast-moving DraftKings narrative. Stay updated as the Fair Value for DraftKings shifts by adding it to your watchlist or...
